Introduction

Content

JavaScript is a powerful and versatile programming language widely used in web and software development. With a simple and easy -to -read syntax, JavaScript is one of the most accessible programming languages for beginners. With the ability to run on many different platforms including web browser, server, mobile phone and IoT device, JavaScript has become one of the most important tools in today's software industry.
